Class MacawCompat

java.lang.Object
com.Ev0sMods.Ev0sChisel.compat.MacawCompat
public final class MacawCompat extends Object
Compatibility layer for Macaw's Hy Paths and Macaw's Hy Stairs by Sketch Macaw & Peachy Macaw.

Both are pure asset packs (no Java plugin), so detection is done by probing for a unique block key from each pack at runtime.

Paths naming: Mcw_Paths_Rock_{RockType}_Brick_{Design}[_Stairs|_Half]
Stairs naming: Mcw_Stairs_{StoneType}_{Design}_Stairs[_Balustrade|_Harp] plus Mcw_Stairs_{StoneType}_Railing[_Balustrade|_Harp]

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init()
      Detects both Macaw packs and, if found, builds variant maps and injects chisel states onto every variant block.

    • isPathsAvailable

      public static boolean isPathsAvailable()
      Returns:
      true when Macaw's Paths is installed

    • isStairsAvailable

      public static boolean isStairsAvailable()
      Returns:
      true when Macaw's Stairs is installed

    • getPathsBlocks

      public static List<String> getPathsBlocks(String rockType)
      Returns Paths full-block variant keys for the given rock type.
      Parameters:
      rockType - normalised or original-case type (e.g. "stone")

    • getPathsStairs

      public static List<String> getPathsStairs(String rockType)
      Returns Paths stair-variant keys for the given rock type.

    • getPathsHalfs

      public static List<String> getPathsHalfs(String rockType)
      Returns Paths half-slab-variant keys for the given rock type.

    • getMcwStairs

      public static List<String> getMcwStairs(String stoneType)
      Returns McwStairs stair + railing keys for the given stone type. Only base variants are included (no connected _Left/_Middle/_Right).

    • detectRockType

      public static String detectRockType(String blockKey, String[] substitutions)
      Detects rock / stone type by first checking the clicked block's own key, then falling back to scanning substitutions.
      Parameters:
      blockKey - the BlockType.getId() of the clicked block (nullable)
      substitutions - the existing chisel substitution keys
      Returns:
      normalised type (e.g. "basalt") or null

    • detectRockType

      public static String detectRockType(String[] substitutions)
      Detects rock / stone type from substitution keys by scanning for Rock_{Type} prefixes. Longest prefix wins.
      Returns:
      normalised type (e.g. "stone") or null
